- Tony would blowout Mark.
- The games were very close.
answer_choices: Tony would blowout Mark.
The games were very close.
target: The games were very close.

input:
I started playing chess with my friend Tim in 2000. I bought a tournament set and clock. We made plans to go to a tournament, but Tim got sick. I went and won five games. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Tim felt great.
- Tim was happy for me.
answer_choices: Tim felt great.
Tim was happy for me.
target: Tim was happy for me.

input:
Ted loves to go to the movies. He sees almost everyone and votes at the Oscars. He has a big party for the Oscars and they all place bets. Ted almost always wins with the movies he chooses. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Ted continues to watch several movies a week.
- He decides to stop watching movies.
answer_choices: Ted continues to watch several movies a week.
He decides to stop watching movies.
target: Ted continues to watch several movies a week.

input:
All of Javier's friends at school have smartphones. However, he still uses an old style flip phone. One day he decides to buy a smartphone too. At first he loves having the access to internet everywhere he goes. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Javier decides to get a smartphone.
- But then he misses his old phone.
answer_choices: Javier decides to get a smartphone.
But then he misses his old phone.
target: But then he misses his old phone.

input:
After I got out of the bus, I walked to the front of the school. I was happy to see some of my friends again. When I walked into first period, it was very familiar. The teacher seemed very good. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I was relaxed and happy.
- I started having a panic attack.
answer_choices: I was relaxed and happy.
I started having a panic attack.
target: I was relaxed and happy.

input:
Tom bit into the Snickers bar and felt a jabbing pain. A small pebble in it made one of his teeth snap in half! He rushed to the dentist. Because it was an emergency, they saw him right away. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The dentist fixed his tooth.
- Tom had so much fun that day.
answer_choices: The dentist fixed his tooth.
Tom had so much fun that day.
target: The dentist fixed his tooth.
